items.summary: Move the meditation guide container to the bottom of PreMeditationPage, maintaining its current structure with the 'More details' button centered at the bottom of the container
Add a hover-only glow effect to the pause/play button on the meditation session page, using the existing theme color
Fix the pause/play button to control audio playback in addition to the timer, so pausing stops both the audio and timer

Place time control (audio scrubber allowing navigation to any point) and volume control inputs in a themed container on the meditation session page with clear indicators, including a percentage display for volume
Adjust timer text color on the meditation session page to be white/light in dark theme and black/dark in light theme
